title: Amulet of Cekugob
data:
{{obsolete}} {{flavour|A strange-looking piece of crystal on an ordinary-looking string, with an odd selection of powers.}} [[File:Amulet_of_cekugob.png]] '''''the amulet of Cekugob'''''
[[Amulet of dismissal|Dismissal]] ego
+1 AC
+1 EV
rElec
rPois
rN++
Prevents teleportation ==Desirability== Most characters will find this amulet useful, but only as a switch. It provides two levels of negative energy resistance, and thus can quickly render you drain-resistant if you find yourself looking down a [[shadow dragon]]'s maw, and [[electricity]] resistance is fantastic when facing [[Nikola]], [[storm dragon]]s, or an [[electric golem]]. Don't leave it on, though; the -TELE can sometimes cost you your life. ==History== This amulet, along with its base type [[amulet of dismissal]], was retired in [[0.19]] Prior to [[0.18]], the amulet of Cekugob used an [[amulet of warding]] as its base type. Prior to [[0.16]], this amulet sped up metabolism. One of the oldest artefacts, it also used to provide rF+ and rC+. Sadly, that made it somewhat game-breaking, so these were removed in the pre-''DCSS'' days. [[Category:Unrands]] [[Category:Amulets]]
